text: Liv On is a collaborative grief and healing album created by Olivia Newton- John, Beth Nielsen Chapman and Amy Sky. The goal behind the album was to "create songs with a message of compassion and hope. They are for anyone facing a time of challenge in their life, whether it is grieving a loss – or on the journey to health and recovery." The album debuted at number 72 in Australia. ==Track listing== # "My Heart Goes Out to You" #*Written by Amy Sky, Beth Nielsen Chapman, Olivia Newton-John / Lead vocals by Amy Sky, Beth Nielsen Chapman and Olivia Newton-John # "Live On" #*Written by Amy Sky, Beth Nielsen Chapman, Olivia Newton-John / Lead vocals by Olivia Newton-John # "Stone in My Pocket" #*Written by Amy Sky, Beth Nielsen Chapman, Olivia Newton-John / Lead vocals by Amy Sky, Beth Nielsen Chapman and Olivia Newton- John # "Sand and Water" #*Written by Beth Nielsen Chapman / Lead vocals by Beth Nielsen Chapman # "Forever Blue" #*Written by Amy Sky / Lead vocals by Amy Sky # "Immortality" #*Lyrics by Mary Elizabeth Frye; written by Amy Sky, Beth Nielsen Chapman, Olivia Newton-John / Lead vocals by Amy Sky, Beth Nielsen Chapman and Olivia Newton-John # "Don't Know What to Say" #*Written by Amy Sky, Beth Nielsen Chapman, Olivia Newton-John / Lead vocals by Beth Nielsen Chapman # "Impossible" #*Written by Beth Nielsen Chapman, Laureen Smith / Lead vocals by Olivia Newton-John # "I Will Take Care of You" #*Written by Amy Sky, David Pickell* / Lead vocals by Amy Sky # "Grace and Gratitude" #*Written by Amy Sky, Olivia Newton-John / Lead vocals by Olivia Newton-John # "There's Still My Joy" #*Written by Beth Nielsen Chapman, Matt Rollings, Melissa Manchester / Lead vocals by Olivia Newton-John ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2016–17) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- ! scope="row"| Australian Albums (ARIA) | 72 |- |- |- |} ==Release history== {|class="wikitable" |- !
